
http://www.winuae.net/files/stuff/drive_sounds.zip


drive_click.wav                default WinUAE sound
drive_click_ST_edit.wav        modified drive_click.wav   
drive_seek.wav                 downloaded buzz loop
drive_seek_edit.wav            ... modified               
drive_snatch.wav               default WinUAE sound
drive_spin.wav                 default WinUAE sound
drive_spin_ST.wav              from WinUAE project
drive_spin_ST_edit.wav         ... modified               
drive_spinnd.wav               default WinUAE sound
drive_startup.wav              default WinUAE sound
drive_startup_ST.wav           from WinUAE project
drive_startup_ST_edit.wav      ... modified               
Sampled by Stefan jL, Epson SMD-480L:
drive_click_Epson.wav                                      *
drive_seek_Epson.wav                                       *
drive_spin_Epson.wav                                       *
drive_startup_Epson.wav                                    *

  * indicates "used in Steem"

  I suspect that drive_spin_ST.wav and drive_startup_ST.wav were
  ripped from SainT.

  If you can please sample some more realistic Atari sounds and upload 
  them at atari-forum. Please don't rip SainT's samples.
